content.body: I'm regularly disheartened that `AbortController` was standardized in WHATWG and not here. It's design privileges DOM APIs over user APIs in a way we very likely wouldn't have designed, and now were essentially stuck with something that only gets us about 50% of what the language actually needed out of cancellation.
